column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
column14: These are very small in size, so they will only last a few applications, but they work very well!  They are not drying and they really pop.  They stay on for hours!  I will be looking into larger versions of my faves, so this is a great sampler set!  Do it!
